sentences.sContent: Please pay the full amount (=  of money  ) by the end of the month.
...The next largest amount of public money goes to teach and train our citizens...
...a large amount of public funds is spent on roads...
...Recycling lowers the amount of waste put into landfills...
...Should awoman who possessed a small amount of drugs years ago be permanently unable to be licensed as anurse...
...The amount of sleep that each person needs varies...
...that doesn't have a large amount of sugar in it...
...and you can tell that it takes a respectable amount of manpower to put together each one...
...The residents are billed by "net metering": they pay for the amount of power they tap off the grid...
...we could learn a large amount of knowledge from different persons on such an opening flat...
...and the amount of student- loan debt carried by households has increased more than five times since 1999...

synos.tran: [会计]总计，合计；相当于；[数]共计；产生…结果

phrases.pCn: 大量的；许多的；大部分的
即使再大(或再多)的…(也不)

trans.tranOther: a quantity of something such as time, money, or a substance
